name: Indian Remy Hair From 10inchs - 30 inches
description:

 * Indian hair is known for its light texture and versatility as it can be matched to any hair types

name: Virgin Brazilian Hair 10inches to 30 inches
description:
Our 100% Brazilian Remy Virgin Hair is Silky, Flawless and Gorgeous, it is Raw and Unprocessed. 

 * Our  Brazilian hair is hand collected from younger women in the porto alegre,Belo Horizonte and Rio de Janeiro regions of Brazil. 

 * The Brazilian Molado Hair is rare and beautiful and because the Hair is from younger bi-racial Brazilian women it takes  1-2 weeks for delivery.
